attributes.action: Universal basic income in response to the consequences of the Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: To support all businesses, large and small, during this time of economic instability while dealing with the economic downturn caused by the Coronavirus.
attributes.background: The government to immediately start a programme of universal basic income for a period of four months for every adult at a rate equivalent to £200 per week in response to the economic consequences of the Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
